title: Raging planet: earthquake: volcano
creator_credit: David Hutt, Richard Burke-Ward, Discovery Communications and Pioneer Productions
brief_description: Raging planet is a series which explores nature at its most hazardous and with the use of brilliant cinematography allows the viewer to be face to face with the violent forces of nature. This installment looks at the effect of earthquakes on California, Tokyo, South China and Mexico City, on buildings, livestock and humans. It also visits volcanoes that have created havoc in the world and talks briefly about predicting disasters and how they have proven true in the past. Originally screened on Discovery channel.
